scripts.prepare: copyfiles index.html public/ & copyfiles css/game.css public/ & copyfiles img/gameAtlas* public/ & copyfiles fonts/* public/
scripts.watch: copyfiles img/gameAtlas* dist/ && copyfiles fonts/*.png dist/ && copyfiles fonts/*.xml dist/ && webpack --watch --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.server: copyfiles img/gameAtlas* dist/ && copyfiles fonts/*.png dist/ && copyfiles fonts/*.xml dist/ && webpack-dev-server --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.dev.js && copyfiles img/gameAtlas* dist/ && copyfiles fonts/*.png dist/ && copyfiles fonts/*.xml dist/
scripts.build-prod: webpack --config webpack.prod.js && copyfiles img/gameAtlas* dist/ && copyfiles fonts/*.png dist/ && copyfiles fonts/*.xml dist/
